items.content_html:
Website Revamp

Recently, we received some feedback from members that the information on our website wasn't quite clear or adequate to help newcomers know what to expect at our meets. We had a quick revamp of our website in response, adding some more information where necessary, and just generally changing how we maintain the website. Here are some quick notes about what we did for our website, and what we're hoping to get from this new setup.
